summary: The module defines data structures and utilities for configuring how randomness is applied within the airbrake simulation, including perâ€‘attribute randomization settings, overall random behavior parameters, and an enumeration of randomization categories, plus a helper to generate altered configurations.
business_intent: To provide a flexible and reproducible way to introduce stochastic variations into simulation runs, supporting testing, scenario generation, and analysis of airbrake performance under varied random conditions.
